## Challenge

You were somehow able to intercept Santa's traffic.

But it's encrypted. Fortunately, you also intercepted the key exchange
and figured out what software he was using.....

    a =  42293538555215282798100455110266565881599829107971869244773384413618546118850868579583095489023778055976570366853411496753062216229293710557686212314300848121614558806328788578096144576605248971916454783615989429937555579437307320472405217413938048149254574677430624
